statements: DELETE FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 101 AND item_id = 201;
DELETE FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM OtherTable WHERE condition = 'value');
DELETE FROM customer WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Female'
DELETE FROM customer WHERE age < 30 AND membership_status = true;

DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date < '2022-01-01' AND customer_id = 123
